raw: Amid virus fears, Pakistan searches for pilgrims from mass gathering .
replaced: Amid the virus fears, Pakistan searches for pilgrims from mass gathering .

raw: Pakistani authorities are searching for tens of thousands of worshippers who attended an Islamic gathering in Lahore last month just as the novel coronavirus was taking root in the impoverished nation , officials said on Saturday .
replaced: Pakistani authorities are searching for tens of thousands of worshippers who attended an Islamic gathering in Lahore last month  Lahore last month just as Coronavirus was taking root in Pakistan , officials said on Saturday .

raw: Authorities want to test or quarantine those who congregated at the Tablighi Jamaat -- an Islamic missionary movement -- from March 10 to March 12 amid fears they are now spreading COVID-19 across Pakistan and overseas .
replaced: Authorities want to test or quarantine those who congregated at the Tablighi Jamaat -- an Islamic missionary movement --  Jamaat -- from March 10 to March 12 amid fears those who congregated at the Tablighi Jamaat -- an Islamic missionary movement -- are now spreading COVID-19 across Pakistan and overseas .

raw: Organisers say about 100,000 people went to the meeting , which took place despite government requests to cancel it in light of the worsening coronavirus pandemic .
replaced: Organisers say about 100,000 people went to an Islamic gathering in Lahore last month  an Islamic gathering in Lahore last month in light of the worsening coronavirus pandemic .

raw: Speaking on condition of anonymity , an official at Lahore 's district commissioner 's office told AFP the gathering 's location outside the eastern city has now been sealed off .
replaced: Speaking on condition of anonymity , an official at Lahore 's district commissioner 's office  Lahore district commissioner 's office told AFP  an Islamic gathering in Lahore last month location outside the eastern city has now been sealed off .

raw: " Authorities in all districts ( of the country ) are trying to find those who have attended the event , " the official said .
replaced: " Authorities in all districts ( of Pakistan ) are trying to find those who have attended an Islamic gathering in Lahore last month , " an official at Lahore 's district commissioner 's office said .

raw: About 2,500 attendees -- including 1,500 foreigners -- who had remained around the event site , which includes a mosque and sleeping quarters , have been placed in quarantine .
replaced: About 2,500 attendees -- including 1,500 foreigners -- who had remained around the event site , which includes a mosque and sleeping quarters , have been placed in quarantine .

raw: So far , at least 154 worshippers who went to last month 's Jamaat have tested positive for coronavirus , with two fatalities to date , authorities told AFP .
replaced: So far , at least 154 worshippers who went to Jamaat have tested positive for coronavirus , with two fatalities to date , authorities told AFP .

raw: Working through word of mouth and from lists of names provided by Jamaat organisers , officials have so far tracked down approximately 7,000 attendees in Punjab province and placed them in quarantine .
replaced: Working through word of mouth and from lists of names provided by Jamaat organisers , officials have so far tracked down approximately 7,000 attendees in Punjab province and placed approximately 7,000 attendees in quarantine .

raw: Tablighi Jamaat is considered one of the world 's largest faith - based movements , with millions of followers , particularly in South Asia .
replaced: Jamaat is considered one of the world 's largest faith - based movements , with millions of followers , particularly in South Asia .

raw: It sends preachers to countries to spread Islam 's ideals .
replaced: Jamaat sends preachers to countries to spread Islam 's ideals .

raw: According to organisers , a number of foreign nationals also attended this year 's gathering from countries including China , Indonesia , Nigeria , and Afghanistan .
replaced: According to organisers , a number of foreign nationals also attended an Islamic gathering in Lahore last month from countries including China , Indonesia , Nigeria , and Afghanistan .

raw: About 1,500 foreigners are now quarantined in Pakistan , but others left the country without being tested .
replaced: About 1,500 foreigners are now quarantined in Pakistan , but others left Pakistan without being tested .

raw: On March 23 , Gaza 's health ministry confirmed its first two cases of coronavirus were Palestinians who had attended the gathering .
replaced: On March 23 , Gaza 's health ministry confirmed Gaza 's health ministry first two cases of coronavirus were Palestinians who had attended an Islamic gathering in Lahore last month .

raw: Pakistan 's Science Minister Fawad Chaudhry expressed exasperation the Jamaat took place , and blamed " the stubbornness of the clergy . "

raw: " Any group of people who will not adhere to the government advice and will continue to do their normal activities will become a danger to others , " he told AFP .

raw: Speaking to AFP , senior Tablighi preacher Naeem Butt said it was " ignorant " and " irresponsible " to blame the movement for spreading the virus .
